column3:

グリッテン砦までひとっ走りどうだ？
届けてもらいたい物があるんだ
column4:
Hey, listen...
How about making a quick run to Fort Gritten?
There's something I want you to deliver for me.

column3:
砦の守備隊長、ヴァネッサは知っているか？
戦闘と鍛錬に明け暮れる彼女の生き方は
おれたち覚者の人生の、ひとつの解答だ
column4:
Do you know Vanessa, 
the captain of the fort's garrison?
Her way of life, consumed by combat and training,
is one answer to how to live our lives as Arisen.

column3:

there must be something to gain, right?
That's why I want to rely on you for this job.
No, that's an order.

column3:
砦に入ったらヴァネッサに従え
彼女があそこの法律だからな
column4:
Once you're in the fort, follow Vanessa's orders.
She's the law over there.

column3:

column4:
It seems that Lord White Dragon's petrification 
is spreading ever so slightly.

column3: 《ブラッドオーブ》が手に入るといいのですが
column4: I hope we can get the Blood Orb.

column3:
レスタニアで起こったことは

数日でこの神殿に伝わってくる
その評価と吟味もわたしの仕事だ
column4:
What happens in Lestania will be relayed to this 
temple, even if it is an event in a remote region.
It is my job to evaluate and scrutinize it.

column3:

column4:

situation has changed since the battle at 
Fort Gritten the other day.

column3: 好転、だといいんだけど
column4: I hope things will improve.

column4:
Vanessa is quite good at understanding jokes, 
but it's best not to get carried away. 
Maintaining a little bit of distance in the 
relationship is recommended.

column3: ――内緒だよ、これ
column4: --Don't tell anyone.

--Even though it may not seem like it, I'm busy. 
Knights aren't as free as Arisen, you know.

column3: どうした？　魔物は倒したのか？

column3:

Don't keep me waiting too long.

column3:
ご苦労だった
おまえが見事に魔物を倒したという

column4:

I've been informed
that you defeated the demon successfully.

column3:
ひとつ確認しておきたいのだが

The spoils were "Blood Orbs," right?

うむ、やはりな

白竜に捧げてくれ

Please bring that 《Blood Orb》 back to the temple
and offer it to the White Dragon.

column3:

ひいてはこの長き戦いに終止符を
打つことになるのだ
column4:
The recovery of the White Dragon will enhance our 
abilities as Arisen, and ultimately bring an end 
to this lengthy battle.

column3: 詳しいことは神殿のミシアルに聞くといい
column4:
It is best to ask Mysial at 
the Temple for more details.

but we can use a force called "Rift Crystal" to 
transfer our bodies to distant places.

locations without using unnecessary energy
and of course return to the temple in an instant!

column4: I hope you remember.

suddenly appeared?

the colour of the visible part of that enemy's 
vitality is said to be unique.

column4: You might want to keep that in mind next time.

止めることができます

When you offer the Blood Orb to Lord White Dragon,
the power of the orb's Dragon Force 
can temporarily halt petrification.

column3:
同時に、あなた自身も竜力を

白竜様に《ブラッドオーブ》を届けた
ごほうびだと思ってください
column4:

power of the dragon yourself.

Blood Orb to Lord White Dragon.

column3:
これからも《ブラッドオーブ》を
持ち帰ってくださいね
column4:
Please continue to bring back the 
Blood Orbs in the future.

column4:
Now, let's deliver the 《Blood Orb》 
to Lord White Dragon!

column3:

まだ覚者の戦い方と装備の準備不足のようだな

I want to assign you an even more dangerous task,
but it seems that you are still lacking in 
knowledge of how an Arisen fight, 
and in equipment preparation.

白竜神殿の宿場区にいるレンテンから
戦術試練をちゃんと学べ
column4:

enemies properly from Renton in the 
Relay Station District of the White Dragon Temple 
and take the tactical trials seriously.

セネカとイリスから物資調達とクラフトによる
装備強化を学び準備ができた上で声を掛けてくれ

For sufficient equipment preparation,
learn about material procurement and crafting 
for equipment enhancement from Seneca and Iris.

Let me explain the procedure right away.

その奥底の部屋を目指す――
column4:
First, go to "The Rift"
and aim for its innermost chambers...

column3:
もし貴君が、我々が仕えるに足る

column4: If you are a man worthy of our service--

貴君はその部屋で
《リムストーンの原石》を見つけるだろう

In that room you will find
the Riftstone Ore.

それを持って
ここに戻って来なさい
column4: Take it and come back here.

column4: What happens after that, that's up to you.

column4: Ah—

column3:

見つけることができなければ――
column4: If you can't find the Riftstone Ore...

我々にできることは何もない
ポーンのことは忘れてくれ
column4:
There's nothing we can do about it.
Forget about pawns.

column3: では、健闘を祈るよ
column4: Well, I wish you the best of luck.

準備ができたら向かいましょう

and bring back a "Riftstone Ore".

column4: However--

The Rift between worlds.

column4: You'd do well to keep that in mind.

先々での情報収集を怠るなよ

Don't neglect to gather information en-route.

震えてしまうんだ
この世の不思議の代表格だね

Pawns appear, I can't help but tremble. 
They are truly the epitome of the mysteries 
of this world.

column3:
ほう――
確かにこれは《リムストーンの原石》
column4:
Ah――
Certainly, this is a "Riftstone Ore".

column3: では、次の段階だ
column4: Now for the next step.

その石片を神殿の白竜様に
お見せしなさい
column4:
Please show that piece of stone to the 
White Dragon in the temple.

column3:
あとは白竜様のご判断次第
身を委ねることだな
column4:
Afterwards, 
it is up to Lord White Dragon's judgment.
To entrust oneself to him.

column3: おや――
column4: Oh--

《リムストーンの原石》は
その手の内にあるのだろう？
column4:
You have the "Riftstone Ore" in your 
possession, don't you?

column3:
ならば神殿に戻り、白竜様の
ご判断を仰ぐが良い
column4:
If so, then you should return to the temple and 
seek the judgement of Lord White Dragon.

column3: おお――《ポーン郷》帰りか
column4: Oh—back from the the Pawn Cathedral?

column3:
例のモノを持ってるなら
ミシアルに見せてこい
column4: If you have that thing, go and show it to Mysial.

ポーンとの契約に奔走中か
column4:

《リムストーンの原石》があるのなら
ミシアルに渡しなさい
column4:
If you have "Riftstone Ore", 
please give it to Mysial.

Oh, I hope to solve the mystery someday!

column4: Thank you for your hard work.

《リムストーンの原石》ですね？

is that Riftstone Ore?

of the contract.

pawn you wish to walk with.

Let me know when you are ready.

おまえに頼むことにしよう

the petrification of the White Dragon,

without relying on the "Blood Orb."

column4:
